name: Sublime Slime
description:
Made for the  ArtCenter Game Jam.

Temporary Hotfix for level 3 lasers and visual bug (https://z-doctor.itch.io/sublime-slime-hotfix)

Features 3 Levels

WASD - Move

Numbers keys or click buttons to select slimes

R - To Reset Level

Escape - To go to the menu

G - To Grab

C - To Combine

Space - Jump

X - To Separate
